text: Psittacodrillia is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Horaiclavidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Psittacodrillia include: * Psittacodrillia albonodulosa (Smith E. A., 1904) * Psittacodrillia bairstowi (Sowerby III, 1886) * Psittacodrillia diversa (Smith E. A., 1882) ==References== * R.N. Kilburn (1988), Turridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda) of southern Africa and Mozambique. Part 4. Subfamilies Drilliinae, Crassispirinae and Strictispirinae; Ann. Natal Mus. Vol. 29(1) Pages 167-320 ==External links== * Tucker, J.K. 2004 Catalog of recent and fossil turrids (Mollusca: Gastropoda). Zootaxa 682:1-1295. Category:Horaiclavidae Category:Gastropod genera
title: Psittacodrillia
